name: iso-bsc
description: Isolated Binance module for Airgap wallet and vault application.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && tsc && node scripts/copy-files-after-build.js && rm -rf ./module && rm -f iso-bsc.zip && mkdir module && browserify ./dist/index.js -p esmify --standalone bsc > ./module/iso-bsc.js && cp manifest.template.json module/manifest.json && cp assets/* module
scripts.build:compile: rm -rf ./dist && tsc && node scripts/copy-files-after-build.js && browserify ./dist/index.js -p esmify --standalone bsc > ./module/iso-bsc.js
